body.text: Kickstart your cost optimization journey by activating the Alert Notification Service through our dedicated application. This crucial first step empowers you to **proactively** oversee your cloud consumption by setting up real-time alerts for usage spikes or budget overruns.

Customize alert thresholds to match your budgetary limits directly within the app, ensuring immediate awareness and control over your cloud costs. Stay on top of your finances effortlessly and **prevent unexpected expenses!**

**Alert configuration:**- Enables configuring alerts to monitor usage and cost consumption.- Alerts can be set based on predefined thresholds, which may be derived from forecasts of cost or usage.- Hierarchical configuration for fine-grained control.
**Alerts can be customized at multiple levels:**- Global Account- Directory- Subaccount- Data Center

**Granular alert options:**- Alerts can be set at the service or individual metric level.- Alerts can be differentiated between commercial measures (charged costs) and technical measures (actual usage).
